name: RequestMaintenanceService
description:
Request maintenance services for an organization.

This tool calls the Entrata API to request maintenance services for a specified organization. It should be used when an entity needs to initiate a new maintenance service order.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The unique subdomain identifier for the client organization requesting the service.

parameters.name: maintenance_request_details
parameters.description: The JSON array containing details required to initiate a maintenance request. Include all necessary fields as per Entrata's API requirements.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The page number for paginated responses. Use to retrieve a specific page in a paginated series.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of items to return per page in the response.

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: include_pagination_links
parameters.description: Set to 1 to include pagination links in the response body, otherwise set to 0.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: The page number of paginated respons.

value_schema.description: The page number of paginated respons.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

value_schema.description: The number of items returned in the respnose

parameters.name: X-Send-Pagination-Links
parameters.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.

value_schema.description: Send Pagination Links in Response Body.
